Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Beijing Mingyi Film and Media Culture Co., Ltd. is located in the core area of Beijing's CBD, with a registered capital of 10 million RMB. The company operates two core divisions: Mingyi Pictures (Film Production and Investment) and Mingyi Publishing (Book Publishing and Distribution).

**Mingyi Pictures (Film Production and Investment)** focuses on the investment, scriptwriting, production, and distribution of films, TV dramas, and documentaries. Notable works include the highly acclaimed documentary *The Fields Will Be Desolate*, exclusively available on iQIYI; the feature film *To Machang*, which was selected for the main competition section of the 17th FIRST Youth Film Festival and won the "Special Mention" award. The film was supervised by renowned international director Yang Chao, with Zhou Xiao, General Manager of Mingyi Pictures, serving as producer and investor. Other upcoming projects include *I Don’t Want Three Days of Light*, *Fourteen*, and *Loyalty*.

**Mingyi Publishing (Book Publishing and Distribution)** has over a decade of experience in the publishing industry, collaborating with more than 200 publishers to produce over 500 titles. Its services span writing, planning, editing, design, distribution, copyright trading, and new media operations. Key publications include the million-copy bestseller *I Don’t Want Three Days of Light: The Growth Story of Nimar Wangdu*, which received widespread acclaim with a 9/10 rating on Douban and endorsements from Wang Shi, founder of Vanke, and renowned writer/director Pema Tseden. Another notable work, *Rise and Fall*, an autobiographical novel about gambling addiction by popular Douyin influencer Zhang Yang, sparked strong social resonance, with related topics accumulating 600 million views. Additionally, *The Power of Mission – The Rise of Yanzhao Driving School* features a preface written by Yao Jinbo, President of 58.com, while the film-novel adaptation *Top Agent: Fatal Secrets* achieved both box office success and high book sales.

Beijing Mingyi Film and Media Culture Co., Ltd. is committed to discovering and creating the most valuable literary and cinematic works, aiming to deliver premium content experiences to audiences.
